title: Overcoming Evil With Good
description: An exposition on Romans 12:9-21. The theme of "overcoming evil with good" is the master and overriding principle of this passage of scripture. This principle goes deeper than what is seen at first appearance.

title: Will We Respond to the Invitation?
description: Only a few will respond to the wedding call of Christ. Are we hearing the call or are we just making excuses? God has a cross for us, and is pleading for our all. Will we allow ourselves to come under the cross and be broken? This is where the blessing is.
